item.title: Systemd-nspawn
item.description: I am a huge fan of docker for my dev environments, it helps me keeping things clear and understanding what are the ressources needed for a project. A few month ago a friend told me that there already is a similar feature on Linux, and this feature is systemd-nspawn. Creating your first container So like docker I wanted to first start a container. Nspawn has no environment so everything has to be done “by hand”.
